enb_long_title: Eighth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: Parties addressed the issue of non- permanence.
The G-77/CHINA delivered a proposal that focused on: principles; elements; and cross-cutting issues relating to non- permanence.
The EU proposed a system for accounting that relies on Temporary Certified Emissions Reduction Units (TCERs).
Parties discussed issues relating to risk, insurance, liability, and carbon rights.
They agreed on the need for formal economic analysis of potential accounting systems.
Co-Chair Sach introduced the issue of baseline methodologies and discussions continued late into the night.
